item.title: Big Tech Asked for Looser Clean Water Act Permitting. Trump Wants to Give It to Them
item.description: New AI regulations suggested by the White House mirror changes to environmental permitting suggested by Meta and a lobbying group representing firms like Google and Amazon Web Services.

item.title: The Structure of Ice in Space Is Neither Order nor Chaos—It’s Both
item.description: Long thought to be completely disordered, space ice appears to have some crystallized regions, new research suggests.
